Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated code to a method
Improvements.Description: There is a repeated pattern where a ServletHolder is created, configured, and added to the context. This code could be extracted to a separate method to improve readability and maintainability.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract long conditionals to a method
Improvements.Description: The conditionals that check settings values are quite complex and make the code difficult to read. These can be extracted to methods with descriptive names to improve readability.
